import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { data, Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Edit = () => { const [equipment,setEquipment]=useState([]) const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/api/equipment/${id}`) .then(resp=>setEquipment(resp.data)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)); },[id]); return(






View
) } export default Edit
